00027 class IntegrationOfFunctions

00045    // Integration of C-style functions
00046 
00047    double calculateTrapezoidIntegral(double (*f)(double), double, double, int);
00048    double calculateSimpsonIntegral(double (*f)(double), double, double, int);
00049    
00050    // Integration of pairs of data (x,y)
00051 
00052    double calculateTrapezoidIntegral(Vector<double>, Vector<double>);
00053    double calculateSimpsonIntegral(Vector<double>, Vector<double>);
00054 
00055    // Integration of class member methods
00056 
00057    // template<class T> double calculateTrapezoidIntegral(
00058    // T t, double (T::*f)(double), double a, double b, int n) method
00059 
00068 
00069    template<class T> 
00070    double calculateTrapezoidIntegral(T t, double (T::*f)(double), double a, double b, int n)
00071    {
00072       double trapezoidIntegral = 0.0;
00073 
00074       // Integration step
00075 
00076       double h = (b-a)/(n-1.0);
00077 
00078       // Sum
00079 
00080       double sum = (t.*f)(a)/2.0;
00081 
00082       for(int i = 1; i < n-1; i++)
00083       {
00084          sum += (t.*f)(a + i*h);
00085       }
00086 
00087       sum += (t.*f)(b)/2.0;
00088 
00089       // Trapezoidal rule
00090 
00091       trapezoidIntegral = h*sum;
00092 
00093       return(trapezoidIntegral);
00094    }
00095 
00096 
00097    // template<class T> double calculateSimpsonIntegral(
00098    // T t, double (T::*f)(double), double a, double b, int n) method
00099 
00108 
00109    template<class T> 
00110    double calculateSimpsonIntegral(T t, double (T::*f)(double), double a, double b, int n)
00111    {
00112       double simpsonIntegral = 0.0;
00113 
00114       // Integration step
00115 
00116       double h = (b-a)/(n-1.0);
00117 
00118       double sum = (t.*f)(a)/3.0;
00119 
00120       for(int i = 1; i < n-1; i++)
00121       {
00122          if(i%2 != 0) // odd
00123          {
00124             sum += 4.0*(t.*f)(a + i*h)/3.0;
00125          }
00126          else // even
00127          {
00128             sum += 2.0*(t.*f)(a + i*h)/3.0;       
00129          }
00130       }
00131 
00132       sum += (t.*f)(b)/3.0;
00133 
00134       // Simpson's rule
00135 
00136       simpsonIntegral = h*sum;
00137 
00138       return(simpsonIntegral);
00139    }
00140 
00141 };
